Question: Which statements are true regarding the characters and actors in 'The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'?
Options:
A. Orlando Bloom played the role of Legolas.
B. Legolas shot Gríma Wormtongue after he stabbed Saruman.
C. Brad Dourif portrayed Gríma Wormtongue.
D. Legolas is a human character in the movie.
Answer: A) Orlando Bloom played the role of Legolas., B) Legolas shot Gríma Wormtongue after he stabbed Saruman., C) Brad Dourif portrayed Gríma Wormtongue.
